title: CDC Votes 15-0 Recommending Covid-19(84) Vaccines For Schoolchildren!! Also #MatthewBad
cleaned_text:
The CDC has unanimously voted to add Covid-19(84) mRNA shots to the recommended childhood vaccine schedule in the United States causing uproar from parents who are worried that Covid vaccine mandates are coming for their kids!

Meanwhile Vancouver musician Matthew Good leader of the Matthew Good Band recently went off on a rant at a concert suggesting that people who protest the governments response to Covid should be “put on a plane and flown to the Congo and let 14 year old kids with AK-47’s shoot at them so that they’ll know what it’s like to live under tyranny”!

In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth covers the latest Covid-19(84) news coming out of the CDC that now suggests that children should receive this experimental mRNA technology as part of their recommended vaccine schedule, opening the door for any state and/or school to mandate vaccines for students moving forward.

If you appreciate my efforts please consider making a contribution here:

Or you can send an e-transfer to dan@pressfortruth.ca

If you’re old fashioned like we are and prefer to keep it old school, we also accept cash, cheques, equipment and words of encouragement! You can send us those things here:
